title: Expenses
context: [ยง428-1104] Expenses. If a derivative action for a limited liability company is successful, in whole or in part, or if anything is received by the plaintiff as a result of a judgment, compromise, or settlement of an action or claim, the court may award the plaintiff reasonable expenses, including reasonable attorney&rsquo;s fees, and shall direct the plaintiff to remit to the limited liability company the remainder of the proceeds received. [L 1996, c 92, pt of ยง1]
